text.section: In this section, "industrial quality eye protective device" means a device that meets the standards of the American Standard Safety Code for Head, Eye, and Respiratory Protection, Z 2.1-1959, adopted by the American Standards Association, Incorporated.

section.section: The school may furnish industrial quality eye protective devices to its students and teachers and to any visitor to its classrooms or laboratories specified in subsection (b) of this section.
The school may buy these protective eye devices in large quantities and sell them at cost to its students and teachers.
